Description: Small rural development (confounded with rural industrial development)
Rural area developed for industrial use

Recreation areas and other vegetated areas created for human use, including golf courses, grave yards, vegetated edges of airports, sometimes along roads and any other disturbed areas that have recovered vegetation
Well pads created by the energy industry
Any area where evidence of cultivation is visible during the photo interpretation
Confined feeding operation and other high density livestock area
Area with trees harvested for industrial purposes
Created to extract fill, or for livestock watering
Created for municipal purposes (some/many of these may be mislabelled)
